plug_desp.message: Allow your chrome using ActiveX plugins.

url_desp.message: The urls in the following list, one per line, will be qualified to load ActiveX plugins whenever possible

url_format.message: The format should be like <scheme>://<host>/<path> . Use * to present any strings. Note the / after host cannot be omitted.

url_regex.message: To use Regular Expression, add "/r" before this line

clsid_desp.message: The trusted CLSIDs, one per line. All the plugins within the following CLSIDs will be actived on every page.

clsid_format.message:
Input with the barket and minus sign.
For example, {ACACC6EB-1FBA-4E13-A729-1234567854F8} .
